com.ubudu.indoorlocation

Class UbuduIndoorLocationSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubudu.indoorlocation.UbuduIndoorLocationSDK

  • public class UbuduIndoorLocationSDK
extends java.lang.Object
    Class describing Ubudu Indoor Location SDK instance. It allows to get an instance of the Indoor Location Manager class for handling all the logic operations.

    • Method Detail

      • getSharedInstance

        public static UbuduIndoorLocationSDK getSharedInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Application get access to the UbuduIndoorLocationSDK thru this static method. The first time it is called, the service is bound to the clientContext. When the application is done with the SDK (eg. in onDestroy), it should send the release() message to unbind the service.
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        Returns:
        sn instance of the UbuduIndoorLocationSDK

      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion()
        Returns the version name of the SDK
        Returns:
        SDK version

      • getVersionCode

        public static int getVersionCode()
        Returns:
        version code of this Ubudu Indoor Location SDK build

      • getIndoorLocationManager

        public UbuduIndoorLocationManager getIndoorLocationManager()
        Returns:
        UbuduIndoorLocationManager instance.

      • release

        public void release()
        When the application is done with the SDK (eg. in onDestroy), it should send the release() message to unbind the service.

      • setNamespace

        public void setNamespace(java.lang.String namespace,
                         UbuduResultListener resultListener)
        Sets the application namespace and, if needed, performs the online fetching of the indoor location data files.
        Parameters:
        namespace - application namespace
        resultListener - listener interface

      • setNamespace

        public void setNamespace(java.lang.String namespace,
                         java.lang.String assetsDirName,
                         UbuduResultListener listener)
        Sets the application namespace and, if needed, loads the data files from the given directory of the project's assets folder.
        Parameters:
        namespace - application namespace
        assetsDirName - name of the directory placed in the app's assets folder containing the indoor location data files
        listener - listener interface

      • exportApplicationDataToExternalStorage

        public void exportApplicationDataToExternalStorage()

      • enableMapOverlaysFetching

        public void enableMapOverlaysFetching(boolean enable)
        Method used to tell the SDK to download and locally store the map overlay images.
        Parameters:
        enable - enable flag

      • setUserInformation

        public void setUserInformation(UbuduUser user)
        Parameters:
        user - UbuduUser object

      • fetchRectifiedMapsOnly

        public void fetchRectifiedMapsOnly(boolean fetchRectifiedMapsOnly)
        Only rectified maps will be fetched from Ubudu Manager Platform if this method is called before `setNamespace` method.
        Parameters:
        fetchRectifiedMapsOnly - enable flag
